title.rendered: Nifty Marketing gets a new business card

content.rendered:
I know what you are thinking. Not exactly news worthy information. But, I love business card designs and I just wanted to post a picture of our new cards, and also wanted to ask for those who are so inclined to add a link in the comments to their business card.

P.S. The Local Search Talk Series is coming strong with a few more interviews next week and oh boy do we have a great line up ahead. Sorry for a week without, we have had some major deadlines holding us up….and I have been assisting my wife a lot more as we just found out that offspring #2 is on the way. Have a great weekend.

Mike Ramsey
